column1: full and floating away outside off, jabbed into the covers
length on off stump, leans in and flicks to midwicket's left
length on off stump, driven on the rise to mid-off
sent back after trying to steal a single. Length in the corridor, plants the front leg across and pokes with soft hands to midwicket's left
short of a length on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket off the back foot
length outside off, forced to block on the front foot
length and coming in at off stump, solidly defended on the back foot
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on with the full face offered

length on middle stump, allows that to come on and flicks it through the vacant midwicket region. Deep square gives a long chase to his right and gets to the ball with a slide. But flicks it into the boundary as he can't control his momentum
short and in the corridor, mistimed pull to short midwicket
short and very wide outside off. Has a slash at that and is beaten
lifted past short fine. Bouncer up at the front shoulder. Swivels and drags this off the high part of the bat and gets four despite being cramped
length outside off, reaches out and pushes into the off side, too hard to steal a single
carves it through cover. Decides that's enough of poking on the front foot. Backs into the leg side, creates some room and slaps it on the rise between the two fielders in the covers
length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
length and across middle stump. Tapped to mid-off on the up
short of a length and across the stumps, mistimed punch into the covers
quick and at a length on middle stump, cramped and hurried, can only push it back down the pitch
length at middle stump, clipped to deep square
full and just outside off. Neat looking drive into the covers but can't beat the fielder
thick edge and into the third man boundary. Short outside off, is very leg side of this and has a swish. No chance for the fielder as this races across a dry outfield
short of a length just outside off, subdued pull, more a push by the end, to mid-on

hammered over the long-on boundary! Stunning hit. He's figured out the length and the angle that's about to come. Short of a length in the corridor. Gets his front leg into the leg side to create room and swings nicely from under it to just lift it over that boundary
beaten. Lovely comeback. Slower ball, short of a length on middle. He makes room and looks for the slog this time and that slides through from under the bat
length and angled in at middle stump. Looks to stab it through the covers, but that comes off the inside half and ends up at midwicket
yorker at off stump. Can't do more than jam that out
full on middle stump, leans in and drives to long-on
slower length ball at middle stump, punched down to long-on with the angle
yorker length at middle stump, squeezed down to long-on
and another yorker. At middle stump and he can only get this flick onto his front leg
full and pushed across outside off. Gets low to try and drive through the covers but is beaten
past extra cover. Length ball just outside off. Half a stride out and then a whip out at this from Tamim. Drives along the floor and gets it to the fielder's right
full outside off, mistimed drive towards mid-off
slower length ball on off stump. Checks the drive, gets it to extra cover's left
short of a length just outside off, cut to point
short of a length and wide outside off. Sweetly timed slash, but straight to point
full on off stump, driven to long-off with the turn
length and angled in at middle. Steps out and looks to go inside out but that slides on. Down to long-on off the inside
short of a length at the stumps, clipped into the midwicket region off the back foot
length at off stump, poked into the covers
length at the stumps, pushed down the pitch, beaten by the flight there
short of a length in the corridor, pulled to deep midwicket's right
outside edge and four more off Hasnain at third man. Length and across him. Reaches out and has a stab. Goes very fine
short of a length just outside off, inside edge onto his thigh as he looks to pull this. Copped that on the inner thigh, where there's no protection
caressed into the square leg boundary. Peak Tamim, this pull shot. Short and up the ribs and he has his front leg in the air briefly as he swipes across it with control
slower length ball at leg stump, leans in and flicks to deep square's left
low full toss and late shape away from middle stump. Forced to slice the ball to extra cover
low full toss at off, driven to long-on's left
googly at a length on leg stump, gets forward and clips to deep midwicket
length outside off. Was looking to get down for the lap sweep, was forced to drive to extra cover
short and turning down leg side. Beats the pull and apologizes to the keeper
short of a length on middle, punched to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket
length and turning down leg again, left alone
short of a length at middle, punched to deep midwicket
full and very wide outside off. Looks to have a swish at that, thick outside edge to short third
length on leg stump, clipped to midwicket
length and pushed wide outside off. Gets the front leg into the leg side and has a hack at that to be beaten
slower length ball at middle stump. Was shaping to flick that but had to adjust. A feeble chip towards long-on
short of a length just outside off, dropped to point's right off the back foot. Looked like another cutter
full and just outside off, gets the front leg out of the way and chops to sweeper's left
length on off stump, backs away and looks to punch through the covers. Mistimed to mid-off's left
clubbed to deep midwicket's left. Sweet connection. Length ball on leg stump, gets low and gets the slog sweep out with conviction
full on off stump, driven down to long-on with the turn
googly cutting across slowly from a leg stump line. Gets on the back foot to try and flick, but he's squared up
beaten. Looks for the reverse but doesn't get in good shape. Googly from a length outside off, it's an ungainly hack in the end
googly, short of a length and staying low as it cuts away outside off. Pulled off the low part of the bat to long-on's left

that looks like the end for Tamim. Third umpire looking at a run-out appeal. Tamim doesn't even wait. Clipped that to deep square's right and wanted to come back for the second. Was forced to put in a slide but the throw came in nicely on the bounce and Tamim was caught well short despite his effort
floated full and very wide outside off. Left alone
length at middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length at off stump, too early into the drive, ends up chipping towards long-off
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length and down leg side. Looks he thinks that will slide down, but it spins onto his pad
length outside off, chopped to point
full and down leg side. Gets low and brings out some elegance with his sweeping technique. Right on top of the ball and along the floor into the long leg boundary
smoked over the extra cover boundary. Nicely struck, this. Flat and full outside off, uses his reach and strikes cleanly
sliced this time as he tries to go over cover again. Length ball and this one ends up coming off the high part of the bat to sweeper's right
length outside off, turning away. Looks for the sweep and is beaten
beaten again on the sweep. Length and jumping away outside off
beaten as he looks for another one that's turning away outside off. This time is skids straight on and under his bat as he looks for the late cut
not called wide. That was very short and turning very wide outside off. Left alone. It'll only be a fourth consecutive dot ball
length outside off, dragged off the toe-end to long-on
yorker length at leg stump, allows that to come on and gently dabs it to short fine's left. That's good placement
yorker length at leg stump. Leans in and meets it on the full, it ends up in mid-off's direction
full slower ball at middle stump. Neatly tucked between deep midwicket and long-on for the second
slower ball at a length on leg stump. Looks for the slog but is through it too soon. Cops it on the pad
yorker at middle stump, jammed down to long-on
short and turning away outside off. Cut straight to point
short and just outside off. Cut on the bounce to point's right, a fumble gives them a run

direct hit from Shadab! Oh that's superb work! Googly at middle stump, steps out and looks for the flick. Gets a leading edge towards long-off. Shadab runs after it himself, puts in a slide to get around it, picks up cleanly and quickly throws it back to hit the base of the non-striker's stumps. He was the only one convinced he'd got his man there as the rest of the ground was focused on Bangladesh getting a third run through the ricochet. But it was sent upstairs and it is out. Superb work from Pakistan's best fielder

holes out to long-on! Beats him in flight for the second time in a row, and this time he'll have him caught. Length on middle stump, steps out and doesn't get to the pitch of this. Looks to whip it over the wide long-on boundary, but it comes off the toe end. The fielder runs in and holds on
short of a length just outside off, opens the face and steers to short third
full on off stump, driven down to long-off
length on leg stump, looks to flick, cops it on the pad
length at middle stump, jabbed into the midwicket region off the back foot
short at middle stump, pulled along the floor to deep square
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Shapes for the slog, but is forced to adjust and flick to deep square
full at off stump, short-arm whip down to long-on
short of a length on leg stump, whipped to deep square off the back foot
full and just outside off, dropped into off side with soft hands
short of a length just outside off, mistimed punch to extra cover
slower ball at a length on off, jumps behind the line of that and uses his wrists nicely to launch this between long-on and deep midwicket. One bounce and over the boundary
yorker at middle stump, gets the front leg out of the way and clips this to deep midwicket
full and just outside off. Mistimed slog allows them a second in the vacant midwicket region
low full toss, slower ball it appears outside off. Gets down for the ramp but there's no pace on that. Just a feeble bunt towards deep square in the end
full and very wide outside off, left alone. 143kph
full and just past leg stump. Walks into the leg side to try and carve this through the covers. Narrowly escapes being bowled
full and just outside off. Too quick as he looks to slug this into the leg side. Inside edge onto pad and trickles pitch side
full on middle stump, driven down to long-on

slams middle stump! First international wicket for Rauf and it is trademark. 144kph length ball at middle stump. Afif does the mistake of heaving across this. It is way too quick to be doing that with his front leg in the leg side. Slides into the stumps
good batting. Holds his shape, stays behind the line and uses the pace of this length ball to tuck it past short fine. Poor ball too, length and on the pads
sweetly timed again. 148kph, full and just outside off. Driven along the floor to sweeper cover
full and wide outside off. Driven to extra cover firmly. Takes the chance with the run, gives it up, but survives as he doesn't get a direct hit

appeal for lbw but that might have pitched just outside leg stump. Full one, shuffles and looks to flick, caught right in front of the stumps. Pakistan have reviewed. That definitely looks like it pitched outside the line. Decision will stand
yorker length at off stump, jammed to backward point
length on leg stump, looks to whip behind square, deflected to the keeper off the pad

hits leg stump. Completely deceived Soumya with an offcutter. Length and at middle stump. He backs into the leg side and shapes to drag this in the square leg direction. But he is through the shot woefully early. Completely outdone
yorker length just outside off, beaten as he looks to chop this behind square on the off side
length outside off, gets behind the line and looks to slog. Comes off the inside half and down to long-on
slower ball, short of a length at off stump. Looks to slog but forced to drag it to deep square as he can't keep his timing
oh sweetly timed. Length ball just outside off, just gets leg side of it and times this cover drive to perfection. Well to the right of sweeper cover. That slid on nicely to the bat
short and wide outside off, mistimed cut to sweeper cover

clears short third man and bounces into the boundary. Offcutter at 129kph, curves away outside off. Mahmudullah has a foot down leg side, his head looking in the midwicket direction, and a massive heave at this. Gets a thick outside edge
full toss on leg stump, whipped straight to deep square
short of a length and shaping away outside off. Punched on the rise to short extra cover

given out caught behind and Babar reviews it. Length ball with a hint of shape away. But then it lands and goes straight on. Babar looks to drive for the one that keeps going away and this seems to have kisses the inside edge. UltraEdge confirms. Babar Azam is gone for a duck. Low take in front by Liton and stunned silence in the ground. That's the review gone too
length outside off, tapped into the covers

gorgeous! Oh there are few who drive through the off side as well as this guy. Length ball curving away outside off. Gets his weight on his toes and opens the face to bisect point and cover. Hardly any fuss
short and down leg side, lets that go
length and down leg side. Looks for the flick and can't get bat on that. Appeal for catch is turned down
short of a length and just outside off. Looks to cut, gets an under edge towards into the pitch
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a length on leg stump, looks for the glance, cops it on the thigh guard
steered past short third man. Short of a length and across him. Allows that to come on and opens the face to beat deep point to his left
length on off stump, looks to flick and cops that on the pad
length on the pads, pitching outside leg too. Friendly stuff. Lets that come on and flicks it past short fine
offcutter at a length on middle stump. Clipped through midwicket from deep in the crease
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
length and just outside off, under edge into the turf on the attempted back foot punch
short of a length outside off, nicely on top of that to hammer it between bowler and mid-off with an angled bat. First runs in international cricket with some force
length and down leg side, can't get bat on the flick
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
short of a length and up at middle stump. Shuffles to try and flick, cops it on the body
length outside off, pushed to short extra cover's left with soft hands
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Under-edge on the cut into the covers
short of a length and angling in at off stump, defended
short of a length and just outside off, jabbed down to third man
length at off stump, mistimed slog towards mid-on
full toss on off stump, drives to extra cover's left. Looked a bit too eager to hit that
short of a length on leg stump, just waits on that and tickles it fine
length on leg stump again, easy to put away. Closes the face at the right time, beats deep square to the right with a glance
short of a length wide outside off. Slashes at it and is beaten
short of a length outside off, punched to mid-off's left
short of a length just outside off, gently caresses this to third man's right

taken at short extra cover! Oh you don't play that shot against Mustafiz. Short of a length ball cutting away from leg stump. Always a risk closing the face against that, especially on this pitch. Hafeez does exactly that, wants to get the single in the square leg region. It's an easy loopy ball for the fielder
length outside off, whipped to mid-on on the rise
length outside off, wants to pummel that on the rise through the off side. Gets an under-edge into the leg side
length at the stumps, pushed to mid-on and a quick call to steal the run. Tumbles after losing his balance at the other end

review against the not out call for lbw. Length ball angled in and striking him in front of leg stump as he looks to flick. Looked like it was going down...yes, and by a long way. Bangladesh were very convinced about that appeal. But it has barely struck him in line. That review is lost
length outside off, inside edge onto boot as he looks for the cover drive
overpitched on off stump, driven to mid-on who is nice and close to save the single
length on middle stump, poked into the midwicket region with soft hands
shot! Mere throwdowns for a guy who has been a cricketer in four decades now. Length and in the corridor. Leans into that, gets the weight into the front foot, and elegantly driven to mid-off's left
offcutter at a length outside off. Mistimed drive on the front foot
length and into the pads. Stands his ground, tickles it fine. Two risk-free boundaries
offcutter, short of a length outside off. Sliced to third man
length outside off, flicked to deep midwicket's left
short of a length on off stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length at off, punched to long-on off the back foot
length and sliding into the stumps. Clipped to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine
length outside off, pushed into the midwicket area
short of a length outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
length on middle stump, punched to deep midwicket's left
length on middle stump, driven down to long-on
short of a length just outside off, jabbed to short third
full on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper cover
short of a length just outside off, punched to long-off off the back foot
whistles past his face. Length ball outside off, absolutely clubbed back at him and he gets out of the way
full on middle, flicked to deepmidwicket
swept to the long leg boundary. Length and down leg side. Quickly on his knee to have a flap at this, and successfully
just short of sweeper cover. The old legbreak dangler outside off. Dips and draws him into an expansive drive. Thick outside edge falls short of the fielder running in
length on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
dropped short outside off, driven to long-off off the back foot
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Attempted slap through the off side is off the under-edge
just past extra cover as he miscues a drive. Offcutter at a length and he was looking to drive on the up
slower short ball outside off, chopped into the pitch off the under-edge
flighted offbreak outside off. Looks for the cover drive and this time it's off the inside edge to midwicket
length at off stump, punched to extra cover on the rise
another offbreak at a length, wide outside off. Cut to sweeper cover
driven down to long-off
short of a length and down leg side. Looks for the pull, gets it to short fine's right off the inside edge
just beats deep midwicket to the left. Full ball outside off. Looks for the slog and doesn't hit it cleanly, but it's enough to go past the boundary on the bounce
short of a length at off, cut to cover and a single stolen as Mahmudullah fumbles

taken at long-off. For the second time he induces a false shot from Ahsan with a loopy wide delivery. His instinct seems to be to try and pummel it on the rise every time it's there, but on this pitch that is practically impossible. Slices it high and it's taken just beyond the circle
length at middle, punched to deep midwicket
length and just outside off, punched on the up to sweeper cover
outside edge past the keeper. Cutter from a length outside off. Drives away from the body and is in no control of this. Dips to the keeper's right and sprints away
leading edge and a misfield at point. Another cutter, full on middle stump. Closes the face too early on the flick. Poor from the fielder there who got a nice bounce and all
outside edge again and this time it's cut off by third man. Offcutter at a length outside off, leans in and has a stab at that
length and very wide outside off. Reaches out and can't connect on that
beaten. Cutter at a length outside off, leans in for the drive and this spins past him
cutter at a length on middle, flicked to deep square
short outside off, dragged to deep square with a pull
length on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
short of a length on off, punched to long-on
length outside off, chopped to short third's left
length on off, defended on the front foot
length at the stumps, steps out and gets a leading edge towards long-off as he looks to flick
short of a length on middle, flicked to deep square
attempted offcutter, short and very wide outside off
squeezed past short fine. Length and into the pads. Stands tall and places this nicely
short outside off, cut straight to point
length on off stump, driven to sweeper's right
short of a length outside off, stays low. Driven to extra cover
full outside off, jammed to extra cover's left with a drive
full on middle, pushed to long-on
drilled over extra cover. Full outside off. Steps out and goes inside-out to loft this. No one back there
length on off, steps out and pushes to mid-off. Looked like a legcutter, that one, 122kph
length on leg stump, tucked through midwicket off the front foot
length on middle, delicately nudged through midwicket
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
short and wide outside off, beaten on the cut

that should be out. Length in the corridor, wants to drive through cover on the up. Does it from inside the line and gets an outside edge. Liton goes for it low in front, with a dive. Soft signal is out. That should be fairly clear, clean take
slower ball at a length on leg stump, allows that to come on and tickles it past the keeper
length at off stump, steps out and drives to mid-off's right

nearly run-out! Imad Wasim at the striker's end. This is a poor call for a run that was never there. Length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right. Didn't even bother sprinting as the only way he'd survive that was if the fielder missed - which he did
offcutter at a length on middle, shuffles and flicks firmly to deep midwicket's left
yorker at off stump, jammed down the pitch

difficult chance dropped at long-off and that will be Malik's fifty. Length ball at off, steps out and lofts it straight over the bowler. Long-off sprints to his right and can't hold on with a dive. Ends up parrying it into the boundary on his right too
good work by sweeper cover. Short and wide outside off, smoked with a cut but the fielder sprints and does well to push the ball back in while regaining his balance
short of a length outside off, sliced to third man's right
length on middle, flicked to midwicket's left
past his shin and into the stumps. That slower short ball just does not rise. He's shaped to pull this but it dips down as it nears him and comprehensively beats the shot
just past extra cover. Another legcutter, this one is floated full at off stump. Leans in and looks to hit this into the leg side. Ends up slicing it to extra cover's left
another legcutter. At a length on middle stump. Defended off the back foot
short of a length outside off, steps out and has a hack, beaten. This one is regular pace
short outside off. Walks down at it, pulls to deep square
legcutter at a length on leg stump. Steps out and looks to chop to third man. Gets it into the leg side off the inside edge
offcutter, dropped short outside off. Lines up and pulls to long-on's right off the front foot
full slower ball outside off. Mistimed drive to extra cover and a call for the single. Might have been run out with a direct hit.

dropped at deep midwicket! Slower ball at a length outside off, Rizwan looks for the slog sweep. Mithun comes under it, some 10-15 yards inside the boundary and over-runs it by a step. It bobs backwards and they take the runs needed to complete the win
